line.comment: * Search visible and valid hostile contacts dependent on attack preference
* Check for wing leader and other mission parameters
* N O T A R G E T A V A I L A B L E / O U T S I D E A W A R E N E S S R A N G E
* If no target available, or if target is lying outside the awareness range, dock all ships

line.text: '%sNo valid target found. Leader %s is %sm away from %s (protect) Range: %s'

line.comment: * T A R G E T I N S I D E A W A R E N E S S R A N G E, O U T S I D E R E S P O N S E R A N G E
* Move out wing for close range patrol around THIS

line.text: '%sTarget found, but outside response range. Leader distance from THIS: %s Range: %s'

line.comment: * T A R G E T I N S I D E R E S P O N S E R A N G E
* If target is inside response range, move wing out and engage target
* Make sure wingships will engage enemy
* Start wing attack on all wing ships
* Target survey: wait here as long as the target is still valid
* Look for other targets, if target leaves response range
* If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack

sval.val: ACC.Protect
%sTarget distance: %s Response range: %s
%sNo valid target found. Leader %s is %sm away from %s (protect) Range: %s
%sTarget found, but outside response range. Leader distance from THIS: %s Range: %s
%sLeader %s starts attack on %s
%sTarget distance from carrier: %s Disengage range: %s
LU Update (Solarahawk): removed player code)
Get global setup
while $target.to.be.protected-> has same environment as [THIS]
Get setup values
Search visible and valid hostile contacts dependent on attack preference
Check for wing leader and other mission parameters
N O T A R G E T A V A I L A B L E / O U T S I D E A W A R E N E S S R A N G E
If no target available, or if target is lying outside the awareness range, dock all ships
T A R G E T I N S I D E A W A R E N E S S R A N G E, O U T S I D E R E S P O N S E R A N G E
Move out wing for close range patrol around THIS
T A R G E T I N S I D E R E S P O N S E R A N G E
If target is inside response range, move wing out and engage target
Make sure wingships will engage enemy
Start wing attack on all wing ships
Target survey: wait here as long as the target is still valid
Look for other targets, if target leaves response range
If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack
